trans-unit.source: Base type for conditions used in filtering when searching for elements in the UI Automation tree.
trans-unit.target: UI Automation 트리에서 요소를 검색할 때 필터링에 사용되는 조건의 기본 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Condition" /> that always evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
This condition exists only for symmetry with <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition>.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제에 대응 하 여 위해서만 존재 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition>합니다.

trans-unit.source: It will never enable a match with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, and it cannot usefully be combined with any other condition.
trans-unit.target: 일치 하는 사용 하도록 설정 하지는 것입니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소가 있으며, 유용 하 게 함께 사용할 수 없는 다른 조건입니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Condition" /> that always evaluates to <see langword="true" />.

In the following example, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition> is used to retrieve all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements within the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition.TrueCondition> 을 모두 검색 하는 데 사용 되 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 지정된 된 범위 내에서 요소입니다.
